Properties.ProtectedString:
--By QuantumSama Tool = script.Parent
local checkConnection local userMouse
function CheckEnabled() if userMouse ~= nil then if Tool.Enabled then userMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else userMouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end end end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end userMouse = mouse checkConnection = Tool.Changed:connect( CheckEnabled ) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if checkConnection then checkConnection:disconnect() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local fakeArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("FakeArrow") local fakeArrowWeld if fakeArrow then fakeArrowWeld = fakeArrow:FindFirstChild("FakeArrowWeld") end
local sparkColors = {Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Color3.new(0,1,0), Color3.new(0,0,1), Color3.new(1,1,0), Color3.new(1,0,1), Color3.new(0,1,1)}
local reload = 1.25
local HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local damage = 10
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function pierce(missile, hit) if hit == nil or hit.Name == "Arrow" or hit.Name == "Flag" or hit.Parent == nil or hit:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) or missile == nil or missile:FindFirstChild("ArrowWeld") or not missile:FindFirstChild("ArrowGyro") then return end touchedYet = true missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then
end
missile.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85004832"
local gyro = missile:FindFirstChild("ArrowGyro") if gyro then gyro:Destroy() end
local missileDirection = missile.CFrame.lookVector local rayStart = missile.Position - missileDirection*4
local ray = Ray.new(rayStart, missileDirection*8) local hit, position = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray, missile) local distance = (rayStart - position).magnitude print("dist",distance)
local arrowDistance = 5.4 local ammountBack = arrowDistance - distance
mCFrame = missile.CFrame - missileDirection * ammountBack missile.CFrame = mCFrame
local flag = missile:Clone()
local newWeld = Instance.new("Weld") newWeld.Name = "ArrowWeld" newWeld.Part0 = hit newWeld.Part1 = missile
print(missileDirection * ammountBack)
newWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0,0,0) if not hit then return end --This really shouldn't be necessary newWeld.C1 = mCFrame:inverse()*hit.CFrame newWeld.Parent = missile
flag.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85005906" flag.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85021844" flag.Name = "Flag" flag.CanCollide = false --flag.Anchored = true debris:AddItem(flag, 15) flag.Parent = missile local flagWeld = Instance.new("Weld") flagWeld.Part0 = flag flagWeld.Part1 = missile flagWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 0.841478229, 1.11013651e-006, -0.540291071, -0.0704218373, 0.991469502, -0.109676696, 0.535681963, 0.130338833, 0.834300041) flagWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -1.5, 0.5, 0.841476381, 1.1125054e-006, -0.540293932, -0.0704221725, 0.991469502, -0.109676391, 0.535684764, 0.130338773, 0.834298193) flagWeld.Parent = flag end
function makeArrow() local missile = Instance.new("Part") local missileMesh = Tool.Handle.Mesh:Clone() missileMesh.Parent = missile missileMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85005601" missileMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.4,1.4,1.4) missile.Name = "Arrow" missile.Size = Vector3.new(0,0,0) return missile end
function makeFakeArrow() --if true then return end if Tool.Parent ~= game.Workspace then return end if fakeArrow then return end print("making fake arrow") fakeArrow = makeArrow() fakeArrow.CFrame = Tool.Handle.CFrame
fakeArrow.Name = "FakeArrow" fakeArrow.Parent = Tool fakeArrow.CanCollide = false
fakeArrowWeld = Instance.new("Weld") fakeArrowWeld.Part0 = Tool.Handle fakeArrowWeld.Part1 = fakeArrow fakeArrowWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0,0,0) fakeArrowWeld.Parent = fakeArrow fakeArrowWeld.Name = "FakeArrowWeld" end makeFakeArrow()
function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = makeArrow()
--Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=76492321"
if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*3 dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 3
-- convert to a 2D space deltaXZSquared = dPos.X*dPos.X + dPos.Z*dPos.Z deltaXZ = math.sqrt(deltaXZSquared) deltaY = dPos.Y
--alpha = math.random()*math.pi/8 + 2*math.pi/6 alpha = .31*math.pi
missile.Position = spawnPos --missile.Size = Vector3.new(math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01) missile.Size = Vector3.new(.1,.1,.1)
gravity = 196.1643 numerator = -0.5*gravity*deltaXZSquared denominator = math.cos(alpha)*math.cos(alpha)*(deltaY - math.tan(alpha)*deltaXZ)
if denominator == 0 then return end missileSpeed = math.sqrt(numerator / denominator) if missileSpeed > 200 then missileSpeed = 200 end vXZ = missileSpeed * math.cos(alpha) vY = missileSpeed * math.sin(alpha) vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaXZ vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaXZ missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ)
missile.CanCollide = false
newBG = Instance.new("BodyGyro") newBG.cframe = CFrame.new(missile.Position, missile.Position+missile.Velocity*Vector3.new(1,-1,1)) --* CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(missile.Position, missile.Position+missile.Velocity) --* CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0) newBG.Name = "ArrowGyro" newBG.P = 10000 newBG.D = 1000 newBG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(newBG.P, newBG.P, newBG.P) newBG.Parent = missile delay(0,function() while missile and newBG and newBG.Parent do --Adding -.5 y so that the arrow stands up more than normal newBG.cframe = CFrame.new(missile.Position, missile.Position+missile.Velocity.unit+Vector3.new(0,-.7,0)) wait(1/30) end end)
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .3 confettiBang:Play() end
missile.Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missile, hit) end) debris:AddItem(missile, 15) end
function gunUp()
for i = 1,20 do upAngle = math.cos(i*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin(i*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end end
function gunDown()
for i = 1,20 do upAngle = math.cos((20-i)*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin((20-i)*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end
end function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onEquip() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
if fakeArrow then fakeArrow:Destroy() fakeArrow = nil end if fakeArrowWeld then fakeArrowWeld:Destroy() fakeArrowWeld = nil end end
function onUnequip() equipped = false
if fakeArrow then fakeArrow:Destroy() fakeArrow = nil end if fakeArrowWeld then fakeArrowWeld:Destroy() fakeArrowWeld = nil end wait(.1) makeFakeArrow() end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position
fire(lookAt)
wait(reload)
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
--Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=76492321"
Tool.Enabled = true end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local walkAnim local arrowAnim
local spamArrow local co
local debounce = false
function onKeyDown(key) if key:lower() == "q" then if debounce == false then spamArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpamArrow") if spamArrow then spamArrow.Value = 1 co = coroutine.create(reset) coroutine.resume(co) debounce = true end end end end
function reset() wait(5) spamArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpamArrow") if spamArrow then spamArrow.Value = 0 end wait(5) debounce = false end
function onActivatedLocal() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end --arrowAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ArrowAnim) if arrowAnim then arrowAnim:Play() end
wait(1.0)
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if walkAnim then walkAnim:Stop() end if arrowAnim then arrowAnim:Stop()end
iceArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("IceArrow") if iceArrow then iceArrow.Value = 0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
